SELECT 'PA' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUBSTR(MAX(PA_NO),3)+1,'0000')) AS PA_NO FROM PATIENT
INSERT INTO PATIENT(PA_NO, PA_REG, PA_NAME, PA_SEX, PA_PH, PA_ADD1, PA_ADD2, PZ_ZIP, PA_BLD_TYPE, PA_INSR_YN, PA_ADM_DT, PA_HEIGHT, PA_WEIGHT) VALUES(#{paNo}, #{paReg}, #{paName}, #{paSex}, #{paPh}, #{paAdd1}, #{paAdd2}, #{pzZip}, #{paBldType}, #{paInsrYn}, 'AMYN02', #{paHeight}, #{paWeight})
mapper.update: UPDATE PATIENT SET PA_REG = #{paReg}, PA_NAME = #{paName}, PA_SEX = #{paSex}, PA_PH = #{paPh}, PA_ADD1 = #{paAdd1}, PA_ADD2 = #{paAdd2}, PZ_ZIP = #{pzZip}, PA_BLD_TYPE = #{paBldType}, PA_INSR_YN = #{paInsrYn}, PA_HEIGHT = #{paHeight}, PA_WEIGHT = #{paWeight} WHERE PA_NO = #{paNo}
mapper.select: SELECT PR.PARE_NO, PR.PA_NO, PR.PARE_CONT, PR.PARE_ENDT, PR.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.ATCH_FILE_CD, E.EMP_DEPT_CD, CD1.COM_DET_CODE_NM AS EMP_DEPT_NM, CD2.COM_DET_CODE_NM AS EMP_JBPS_NM, AFD.ATCH_FILE_DETAIL_SAVENM AS PROFILE_NM FROM PATIENT_RECORD PR INNER JOIN EMPLOYEE E ON PR.EMP_NO = E.EMP_NO INNER JOIN COM_DETAIL_CODE_INFO CD1 ON E.EMP_DEPT_CD = CD1.COM_DET_CODE INNER JOIN COM_DETAIL_CODE_INFO CD2 ON E.EMP_JBPS_CD = CD2.COM_DET_CODE INNER JOIN ATCH_FILE_DETAIL AFD ON E.ATCH_FILE_CD = AFD.ATCH_FILE_CD WHERE PR.PA_NO = #{paNo} ORDER BY PR.PARE_ENDT
